actions.text: Amendments en bloc (A006) offered by Mr. Young (FL).
On agreeing to the Young (FL) amendments (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 6, 32, 76, 77, 78, 79, 80, 81, and 82 printed in House Report 113-170 and printed on page H4911 of the Congressional Record for Tuesday, July 23, 2013.
purpose: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments Nos. 6, 32, and 76 through 82 printed in House Report 113-170.
